plays.text: Penalty to Niklas Sundstrom 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding the Stick Kris Draper
Penalty to Steve Yzerman 2 minutes for High Sticking Brad Stuart
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Todd Harvey
Penalty to Sean Avery 2 minutes for Diving(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Kris Draper assisted by Sergei Fedorov
Goal scored by Steve Yzerman unassisted
Penalty to Steve Yzerman 2 minutes for Slashing Owen Nolan
Penalty to Patrick Marleau 2 minutes for Crosschecking Tomas Holmstrom
Goal scored by Brett Hull assisted by Steve Yzerman and Boyd Devereaux
